examples.example: 妈妈用面粉做出了美味又好看的糕点。

translate.english: Mother made delicious and good-looking pastries with flour.

examples.example: 小朋友们用面粉做出了各种可爱的造型，充满了创意和欢乐。

translate.english: Children made all kinds of lovely shapes with flour, full of creativity and joy.

examples.example: 我和朋友们一起用面粉制作了充满乐趣的手工艺术品。

translate.english: I and my friends made fun handcrafted artworks with flour together.
